os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: All 32-bit MS Windows (95/98/NT/2000/XP)

name: MyMo Manager
short_description:
MyMo Manager is a window based Movie Cataloging utility which let you view, filter and manage your personal Movie Library. The application is in beta version and comes bundled with following features:

1. Define multiple directories containing Movies
2. Download Movie details from Internet and store the downloaded information at a central location or, within the Movie's directory; as per your choice. The downloaded information is stored in human readable (HTML) form and can also be read without using the utility.
3. Ability to run lengthy processes in background to continue other stuff within the utility without waiting for them to finish.
4. Name the MyMo Manager utility as YourName’s Movie Manager
5. Filter Movies on the basis of
o Seen or, Not Seen Movies
o Movie title
o IMDB rating
o Multiple Genres etc

6. Manage your Movies by coping, moving or deleting them directly from utility (available in Movie Detailed View only). Filter your movies and manage them accordingly
summary: View, Filter & Manage your entire personal Movie collection
